jd: Hi All,Please find today's open job requirement for .Net Production Support role forRemoteExperience : 8 plus yearsJob Location : RemoteIt is not a .Net Developer role we are looking for Complete .Net Support profileJob description:Note: First priority is to candidate have (Oracle Health / formerly Cerner Corporation then Oracle Cerner exp)Responsibilities:24/7 production support for .NET applications, troubleshooting and resolving incidents in a timely manner.Strong troubleshooting skills to quickly diagnose issues, leveraging monitoring tools to identify performance bottlenecks and system anomalies.Should have strong communication skills and should be able to work with client team independently.maintain monitoring solutions using Dynatrace and AlertSite to ensure high availability and performance of applications.Participate in incident response, conduct root cause analysis, and collaborate with development teams to implement corrective actions.Maintain and enhance operational documentation, including runbooks, playbooks, and incident response protocols.Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, QA, and product management.Identify opportunities for process improvements and participate in ongoing SRE initiatives.
